text: Ra hamile pratyeka samudayako lagi kurbaniko tarika nirdharita gareka chaum taki allahale juna pasuharu uniharula'i di'eko cha tyasamathi (halala garne bela) allahako nama le'un. Atah bujhirakha timro pujya e'utai cha. Tasartha usaiko ajnakari bana ra vinamrata apana'uneharula'i subhasucana suna'idinu
